compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

Properties.Name: oberti-workshop8-dev | Validate request body and querystring parameters

Schema.title: SignUp Model
Schema.description: This is an example of body we need in order to register a user

email.description: email address of the new user

password.description: password of the new user (Min 8 characters, 1 UpperCase, 1 Number and 1 Lowercase

Schema.title: Verify Code Model
Schema.description: This is an example of body we need in order to verify a new user

email.description: email address of the new user

Schema.title: LogIn Model
Schema.description: This is an example of the body we need in order to retrieve token for a given user

password.description: password of the user (Min 8 characters, 1 UpperCase, 1 Number and 1 Lowercase

Schema.title: Renew Input Model
Schema.description: This is an example of body we need for renew a user's token

refreshToken.description: the refresh token the user has

Schema.title: Change Password Model
Schema.description: This is an example of body we need in order to change user password

password.description: password of the user (Min 8 characters, 1 UpperCase, 1 Number and 1 Lowercase

newPassword.description: new password of the user (Min 8 characters, 1 UpperCase, 1 Number and 1 Lowercase

Schema.title: SignUp Model
Schema.description: This is an example of body we need in order to register a user

accessToken.description: the acces token the user has
